name: Team All Hail Noah
tagline: an amazing place for young gamedevs to make games together!
body:
### Welcome to Team All Hail Noah, where Green Unicorns peacefully share their Mysterious Magic with silly humans!
* Team All Hail Noah is a young gamedev team made by young gamedevs.
* Team All Hail Noah is making games together.
* Official Team All Hail Noah, also called AHN Core, are @Folis (F0lis on Twitter), @michcioperz, @Jacic (IamJacic on Twitter), @SuperHawksman and MrGame64 (on Twitter).
* Rebel Team All Hail Noah, also called Ponycorn AHN, are @michcioperz, @Puzzlem00n and @finnbar. They're making a game for 22Jams02.

### Where do we meet? On old-school IRC!
`#GamedevTeam on irc.afternet.org`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
